content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'demoDB')
    CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-----

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'NYCTaxi')
    CREATE SCHEMA NYCTaxi
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.NYCTrip
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'lh-synapse-container/NYCTrip/data',
    DATA_SOURCE = myDataSourceManaged,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquetFileFormat
)
AS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.dfs.core.windows.net/lh-synapse-container/Data/NYCTrip.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT * FROM NYCTaxi.NYCTrip
